directions: Place 4 tomato slices on a serving platter or individual plates. Place 3 pieces of basil, 1 teaspoon of gorgonzola, and 1 teaspoon goat cheese on top of each slice. Repeat 3 or 4 times to create towers. Then drizzle with balsamic vinegar and oil, and top with gorgonzola.
ingredients: 2 large beefsteak tomatoes, cut horizontally into 1/2-inch slices
title: Tomato Basil Towers
